name: Pod Racer Obstacle Dodge
description:
Play as Anakin in his signature pod racer and dodge through the dangerous landscape of Tatioone in this Infinite Runner Game!

Controls: Up and Down to Switch Between Lanes.

Parody Inspired by the pod racing scene from Star Wars Episode 1: A Phantom Menace.

Link To Scene: 

A Game By Edgardo J. Hernandez/ejmaster7

#Movie Game Jam 2018
